```{r}
pacman::p_load(sf, tidyverse, tmap)
```

```{r}
NGA_wp <- read_rds("data/rds/NGA_wp.rds")
```

```{r}
p1 <- tm_shape(NGA_wp) +
  tm_fill(
    "wp_functional", n=10, style='equal', palette='Blues'
  ) +
  tm_borders(
    lwd=0.1,
    alpha=1
  ) +
  tm_layout(
    main.title="Distribution of funtional water",
    legend.outside=FALSE
  )
```

```{r}

```

```{r}
tmap_arrange(p2, p1, nrow=1)
```

```{r}
NGA_wp <- NGA_wp %>%
  mutate(pct_functional = wpfunctional/total_wp) %>%
  mutate(pct_nonfunctional = wp_nonfunctional/total_wp)
```
